headline: Governor DeWine and now First Lady diagnosed with COVID
author: Katie Shatsby
sentences: First Lady Fran DeWine has now been diagnosed with COVID by her personal physician and is experiencing symptoms similar to the Governor’s.
COLUMBUS, Ohio (WDTN) — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine provided an update on his and his wife’s COVID-19 status.
It was announced last week that DeWine has COVID, and his symptoms have not worsened since then.
Both the Governor and First Lady DeWine are continuing to quarantine at home.
DeWine’s office said she has received a monoclonal antibody treatment.
He still continues to have mild symptoms.
